titleStmt.title: To the noble, and right honorable Lords, and the honorable knights, citizens, and burgesses in the high court of parliament assembled the humble petition of Chistofer Syms touching a book entituled Great Britans Al arm [sic] by him to them dedicated.
titleStmt.author: Syms, Christofer.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
